name: showNav
description: Set to `true` to show the navigation links in the header.

name: showSearch
description: Set to `true` to show the site search input form.

name: homeHref
description: The `href` of the link for the logo and mobile home link in the navigation links. Defaults to `"/"`.

name: ariaLabel
description: Aria label for the logo href. Defaults to `"NHS homepage"`.

name: organisation
description: Settings for header with organisational logo.

params.name: split
params.description: Longer organisation names can be split onto multiple lines.

params.name: logoURL
params.description: Organisation logo if using a static asset, such as PNG, is preferred.

name: service
description: Settings for the service name in the header.

name: primaryLinks
description: Array of navigation links for use in the header.

params.name: url
params.description: The href of a navigation item in the header.

params.name: label
params.description: The label of a navigation item in the header.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the list item containing the link.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the list item containing the link.

name: transactional
description: Set to `true` if this is a transactional header (with smaller logo).

params.name: href
params.description: The href of the transactional header name.

params.name: longName
params.description: Set this to `true` if the transactional service name is longer than 22 characters.

name: searchInputName
description: The name for the search field. Defaults to `"q"`.

name: baseUrl
description: Base URL to prepend to the organisation logo URL.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the header container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the header container.
